question: The Union Minister Nitin Gadkari has approved the licence plates bearing numbers in white fonts for private e-vehicles (electronic vehicles), the color of the plate is;
explanation: The green licence plates will make it easy to identify electric vehicles for preferential treatment in parking, free entry in congested zones and other proposed benefits like concessional toll. Currently there are four kinds of vehicle number plates in India: white licence plates with numbers in black font for private vehicles, yellow plates with black font for commercial vehicles, black plates with yellow font letters for self-driven rental vehicles and blue plates with white font for Embassies and High Commissions.
